offerDescription.processingFeeDisclaimer:
Family Discount pricing. Save 37%.
Reg $7.99/mo. See Offer Details below.
highlightsText: 400+ channels to stream on your devices with the SXM App. If you want to listen in your car, you'll need your phone
Ad-free music for every genre & decade plus artist-created channels
Original talk, podcasts, exclusive comedy & news from every angle
Play-by-play of select major sports, NASCAR®, plus the biggest names in sports talk
SiriusXM video library of in-studio shows & performances
offerDescription.footer: No car required to listen to your favorites in all your favorite places—on your phone, at home, and online. View Channel Lineup

offerInfos.offerDetails: OFFER DETAILS: With the SiriusXM family discount, activate a Streaming Music & Entertainment Plan at the current discounted rate of $5.00/month. Fees and taxes apply. A credit card is required on this offer. Service will automatically renew thereafter every month according to your chosen payment method and you will be charged at the then-current rate. If your account no longer qualifies for the family discount, your plan will automatically renew at the then-current rate (currently, $7.99/month). Please see our Customer Agreement at www.siriusxm.com for complete terms and how to cancel, which includes online methods or calling us at 1-866-635-2349. All fees, content and features are subject to change. This offer cannot be combined with any other and may be modified or terminated at any time. To qualify and maintain the reduced family discount rate, you must have more than one subscription on your account and at least one subscription must be active on a full-priced Platinum, Music & Entertainment, Military Platinum or Music & Entertainment, Streaming Platinum or Streaming Music & Entertainment Plans, Aviation, Marine Weather or Fish Mapping package, or other qualifying plan. Trial subscriptions, ad-supported and promotional or discount priced plans do not qualify additional subscriptions for reduced rates. Eligible subscriptions are subject to change.
